about_the_game:
Embark on a perilous adventure in this 2D Metroidvania game as you assume the role of Onchu, a druid boy stranded on an island where dark magic is corrupting the natural world and its inhabitants. Separated from his father, Onchu's only hope is to find him and together save the island from destruction.

Journey through a breathtakingly crafted world, rendered in a stunning sidescrolling style, as you learn new magic and abilities to survive and overcome the island's many dangers. Along the way, you'll encounter various individuals, some friendly and others not so much, who will either aid or hinder your quest.

Will you be able to unravel the mystery of the corrupted magic and save the island before it's too late? Only time and your skills as a druid will tell.

More about the Game on my YouTube Channel or here closer to release.
